sentences.en: As you have seen,this is surprisingly easy to do if you follow a simple methodology.
sentences.cn: 您已经看到，如果按照一种非常简单的方法，这一步令人吃惊地容易。

sentences.en: Back in the 1970 s, we created a methodology built on data structures.
sentences.cn: 70年代, 我们建立了一种基于数据结构的方法学.

sentences.en: His current work centres upon the study of methodology in teaching.
sentences.cn: 目前他的工作集中在研究教学法上.

sentences.en: His world outlook philosophy and methodology are applied self - consciously at economic domain.
sentences.cn: 他把哲学的世界观和方法论自觉地运用于经济领域.

sentences.en: In OO methodology, classes contain certain data and exhibit certain behaviours.
sentences.cn: 在面象对象方法学中, 类包含通常的数据并列出通常的行为.

sentences.en: In their methodology the classical economists fell into two camps.
sentences.cn: 古典经济学家的方法论分为两大阵营.

sentences.en: In their own work they may have favored the use of methodology different from mine.
sentences.cn: 他们在做自己的工作时，也许更喜欢使用和我不一样的一套方法。

sentences.en: Problems exist in various aspects, as teaching arrangement, teachers, methodology, and textbooks.
sentences.cn: 在教学安排 、 师资队伍 、 教学方法 、 教材建设等方面都存在问题.

sentences.en: recent changes in the methodology of language teaching
sentences.cn: 语言教学法最近的变化

sentences.en: Such distortion may be traced onto his " translation methodology ".
sentences.cn: 这种歪曲,可以说是从 “ 翻译的方法 ” 上来的.

sentences.en: Teaching methodologies vary according to the topic.
sentences.cn: 教学方法因题目而不同。

sentences.en: The CPI methodology has been continuously improved since its inception.
sentences.cn: cpi方法体系自采用以来不断地得到完善.

sentences.en: The latter's methodology was more fluid and more convenient for application.
sentences.cn: 后者的方法更富于成果,更便于应用.

sentences.en: The monograph is conceptually confused, unclear in its structure and weak in its methodology.
sentences.cn: 这篇专论概念混淆，结构不清，研究方法也经不起推敲。

sentences.en: This concentrator was chosen as an example to illustrate the general methodology involved in Virus concentration.
sentences.cn: 这种浓缩器被选作说明涉及浓缩病毒一般方法学的例子.

sentences.en: This paper describes the re - check process, work methodology , re - check scope, technical req.
sentences.cn: 介绍了复查过程 、 工作方法、 复查 范围 、 技术要求和复查成果.

words.tran_cn: 使用体验派表演方法的

phrases.tran_cn: 响应面分析；效应面优化法；反应曲面分类研究法

trans.tran_cn: （从事某一活动的）一套方法，方法学，方法论
trans.tran_en: A methodology is a system of methods and principles for doing something, for example for teaching or for carrying out research
